content:
Sorry to intervene with such pedantic issues, but since Valeria de Paiva also wanted to have a topic like this I thought of opening an ad-hoc stream here: #AMS MRC on applied category theory
Would it be ok to move this stream there @John Baez ?

Matteo Capucci (he/him) said:

Sorry to intervene with such pedantic issues, but since Valeria de Paiva also wanted to have a topic like this I thought of opening an ad-hoc stream here: #AMS MRC on applied category theory
Would it be ok to move this stream there John Baez ?

I'd like a whole stream on chemistry so my 14 students can have lots of "topics" for discussing chemistry without having to sift through Valeria's comments, which will be about a different topic: Dialectica categories. We already have 2 such topics.

It's too bad we can't do streams, substreams, subsubstreams etc.
@Matteo Capucci (he/him) Can I get access to Valerias stream?
@Georgios Bakirtzis, Valeria's stream appears to be at #practice: Dialectica. (I found it by looking at the recently added streams, as announced by the Notification Bot in #general.)
Oh gotcha the one above was private that's why I got confused thanks!
